component_summary.name: Avatar
component_summary.description: Composable avatar primitives built on @radix-ui/react-avatar. Exposes Root, Image and Fallback components with consistent sizing and styling via the `cn` utility. Intended for user/profile images with graceful fallback.

notes: Presentation-only components; behavior and accessibility delegated to Radix primitives.
Low duplication risk; consistent with other UI primitives in the project.
